DOC.brief_summary: Folic acid , form vitamin folate , add grain product Canada help reduce birth defect . Folic acid synthetic form folate stable ( n't break ) add food . There emerge health concern chronic folic acid consumption . Recently another natural form folate , L-5-methyltetrahydrofolate ( L-MTHF ) become available . The investigator plan conduct randomized trial woman determine supplement contain L-MTHF consume three month raise blood folate level much supplement contain folic acid . The investigator hypothesize L-MTHF increase red cell folate 12 week extent equimolar folic acid .
DOC.detailed_description: The propose study twelve week , cross-sectional , double blind , randomize control trial . The sample population consist one-hundred fifty healthy adult volunteer . All participant Malaysian woman eighteen forty-two year age . Study participant recruit word mouth advertisement place hospital university start January 2011 . Study participant randomly assign 1 3 treatment group : 1 ) 1000ug L-MTHF 2 ) 1000ug folic acid 3 ) placebo ( methyl cellulose ) . All treatment give capsule form . Blood sample collect baseline , 6 12 week . The primary outcome measure red cell folate . A sample size 45 subject per group allow u detect minimum difference 100 nmol/L red cell folate assume alpha 0.05 , beta 0.8 SD 183 nmol/L . Accounting 10 % attrition rate enroll 50 woman per group . The study analyze intent treat . Baseline characteristic compliance treatment group compare use one-way ANOVA continuous variable chi-square analysis categorical variable . The difference measurement treatment group week 12 determined regression analysis , control baseline value .
DOC.criteria: Malaysian nationality Pregnancy Vitamin supplement user Chronic disease prior neural tube defect affect pregnancy
